New Records: Sean Manaea won his fourth straight decision
Francisco Alvarez and Luisangel Acuña hit home runs in the second inning
The New York Mets remained two games ahead of Atlanta for the final NL wild card
The Mets improved to 5-1 on their seven-game homestand minus Francisco Lindor
Key Match Events: Brandon Nimmo hit a tiebreaking single in a three-run seventh inning
Francisco Alvarez added a two-run double in the seventh inning
Sean Manaea allowed three runs and three hits in seven-plus innings
The game's score was 6-3 after the Mets' seventh-inning rally
Pre-Game Insights: The Phillies were one win away from securing the NL East title
Manager Carlos Mendoza emphasized the team's resilience
A crowd of 44,152 filled Citi Field
Post-Match Reflections: Kyle Schwarber expressed the Phillies' desire to win the division
The Mets benched J.D. Martinez due to a career-worst slump
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets finished 5-5 this season in their new gray City Connect jerseys
Phillies starter Ranger Suárez allowed five hits and three walks in five innings
